Tempe.Papago Park Military Reservation:
Papago Park Military Reservation is a facility of the Arizona Army National Guard in Phoenix, Arizona that is home to the Papago Army Aviation Support Facility and the Arizona Military Museum. Formerly, it was also home to Camp Papago Park and is adjacent to Papago Park.
On Halloween of 2014, a crew from the 2nd Battalion, 285th Aviation Regiment dropped candy on a local neighborhood.
